definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Joshua sent these spies into Jericho to bring out Rahab and family.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚派这两个探子进耶利哥城把喇合和家人带出来。

sentences.english: Rahab went downstairs and told the guards that the men had already left the city.
sentences.chinese: 喇合下楼来告诉士兵们，那两人已经离开城里了。

sentences.english: Some of the Israelite soldiers rushed off to find Rahab.
sentences.chinese: 以色列的一些士兵急忙寻找喇合。

sentences.english: How would they know which house was Rahab's?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么知道哪个房子是喇合的家呢？

definition: Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]
Epistle of St Paul to the Hebrews
Jephthah (Hebrew: Yiftach) son of Gilead, Judges 11-foll.
